subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : For a given shell, the total number of allowed orbitals is given by . Statement (II) : For any subshell, the spatial orientation of the orbitals is given by to values

options.text: (1) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(2) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(3) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(4) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
